abstract: The proposed sale of Gothamist, the city-focused blog network, to Cablevision has collapsed, The Village Voice’s Runnin’ Scared blog reported on Friday, citing unnamed sources.
snippet: The proposed sale of Gothamist, the city-focused blog network, to Cablevision has collapsed, The Village Voice’s Runnin’ Scared blog reported on Friday, citing unnamed sources.
lead_paragraph: 3:00 p.m. | Updated The proposed sale of Gothamist, the city-focused blog network, to Cablevision may be in trouble. The Village Voice’s Runnin’ Scared blog reported Friday that the deal had collapsed, citing unnamed sources.

headline.main: Trouble Seen for Gothamist Sale to Cablevision
